General.Name: Union Jack Oil plc
General.Description: Union Jack Oil plc operates as an onshore oil and gas company in the United Kingdom. The company focuses on production, drilling, development, and investment in hydrocarbon projects. It holds interests in the West Newton, Wressle Discovery, Broughton North, Biscathorpe, Keddington Oilfield Louth, North Somercotes, Fiskerton Oilfield, North Kelsey, Dukes Wood, Kirklington, Widmerpool Gulf, Laughton, and Humber Basin projects. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Bath, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 6 Charlotte Street, Bath, United Kingdom, BA1 2NE
